About me

I am an INRA researcher in statistics at UMR AgroParisTech/INRA MIA Paris since February 2016. Before that, I was a member of the Laboratory of Mathematics and Modeling of Évry.
My research mainly focuses on Statistical learning (sparse methods, clustering, graphical models, latent variable models...) applied to the analysis of data from life sciences, more particularly omics data. More on this can be found in my Habilitation à diriger les recherches.
Here is a full academic CV (October 2018)
